name: Map
description:
The map displays three islands: Mango Island, Monkey Island to the North, and Skull Island to the East.
 At the bottom of the map, there is a note: To unlock the secret treasure of Skull Island, seek the Monkey King

name: Sword
description: Durable blade forged by your uncle, used for offensive attacks. Increases damage points to 5pts.

name: Monkey Pin
description: Awarded from saving the monkey prince, to win respect of monkey king.

name: Mango
description: Delicious fruit found on Mango Island. Restores health by 5pts

name: Cracker
description: Cracker given by the Pirate Captain, to entice the Parrot

name: Note
description: Banana, Monkey Business, Monkey see monkey do

name: Banana
description: Delicious fruit found on Monkey Island. Restores health by 10 pts

name: Left Boss Key
description: Left key to unlock the Boss Door

name: Right Boss Key
description: Right key to unlock the Boss Door

name: Treasure Key
description: Key awarded by earning favor of the Monkey King. Fabled to be the lost key to the secret treasures of Skull Island

name: Treasure Chest
description: Congratulations Adventurer, you conquered a great quest

name: Treasure room key
description: Key earned by defeating Skull King, to access the treasure room

name: Boat Pass
description: Boarding pass from the Pirate Captain, allows you access to the boat.

name: Temple Pass
description: Ribbon for solving the Monkey Temple guards riddles, allows you access to the temple.
